channel.title: Error connecting! Please read!
channel.description:
i have made an rsps and in the client.java (in source) i put my no-ip and in my client.java (in client) i put my no-ip Gui (in client) i put my no-ip
but when i load the client up it says error connecting why is that?
before the servers ip was 127.0.0.1 and i changed it to my no-ip can somone please tell me whats wrong?

item.title: Error connecting! Please read!
item.dc:creator: @wartek wartek
item.description:
@wartek wrote:

[quote=“lostmyphat, post:4, topic:452044”][quote author=wartek link=topic=554923.msg4063694#msg4063694 date=1343674885]
if you want connect to your own pc use the ip 127.0.0.1, if you want someone else to connect from their pc to your pc use your no ip.
A hoster can’t connect to his own ip.
[/quote]

He actually can, it’s just localhost is faster because you don’t have to connect over the internet[/quote]
well I’ve learned that connection to your own ip is impossible…

Read full topic
